subject: ATTN; DEA
body:
ATTN; DEA
This is Mrs.jennifer johnson I have registered your ATM CARD to the POST
OFFICE BENIN REPUBLIC so that they will Post it to your hom address and I
believe your current address is still the same. Your total amount in the
envelope is $15.8 Million USD and the POST OFFICE assured me that there
will be no stoppage until it get to your hand. I want you to contact them
and re- confirm your address where to Post it.
Contact Hon.kenneth andrson
03 BP 1000,COTONOU
BENIN REPUBLIC.
E-mail:postoffice0203@aol.com
Your full information for the Postal.
whatssAp number;+229-5394-8699
FULL NAME: ==============
COUNTRY: ==============
CITY: ==============
CURRENT HOME ADDRESS: ===========
TELEPHONE/CELL PHONE NUMBER.=========
AGE/OCCUPATION: =============
SEX/A COPY OF YOUR IDENTIFICATION: ===============
the manager, informed me that it will take good 3 days to get to your house
and your Envelope accumulate. Your Current address has to be reconfirmed
when contacting the post office the only fee you will pay is delivery fee
you will pay is delivery fee. Thanks & remain blessed.
Mrs.jennifer johnson

subject: Re:   ATTN; DEA
body:
Hello Johnson,

Thank you for your message. It's exciting to hear about the ATM card. I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about this? How did my name come up for this?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Berniece

subject: Re:   ATTN; DEA
body:
Dear Beneficiary,

Greeting to you and your family hope all is well?

This is to notify you that newly appointed Minister of finance and the governing body of the United Nations Monetary Unit have a gathering with president Benin in arrange to hand your fund over to one Mr. Kevin smooth due to time wasted there called on me last night to notify me concerning new development I pleased with them to give you more time to consider?  About this that you may have a reason of not complying.

 

Because of the past I told them that I will get in touch with with you before there will go ahead and do what eve there like but let them give me little time to contact you for the last time and there approve of it ask me to contact you meanwhile I’m the only person to assist you get your lost back only if you will trust me and comply with me.

 

Because there give me last mandate to get back to them or I will face the law if Kevin smooth said that he don’t need the fund anymore because of me I told them that I will get back to you and what eve that occur I will update them so I need to hear from you before this thing get out of hand okay waiting to hear from you soon because what eve you say now is what I will represent to them

 

I’m a good Christian and I don’t want anything to go erroneous so I will be waiting for your urgent comply over this

 

number+229-5394_8699
Mr. Kenneth Henderson

subject: Re:   ATTN; DEA
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth Henderson,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your concern and the effort you've put into reaching out to me regarding this matter.

I must admit, I'm a bit confused about the situation. Could you please clarify who exactly is Mr. Kevin Smooth and what his role is in all of this? Also, could you explain more about the fund that you mentioned?

I'm eager to understand better so that I can provide an appropriate response. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Berniece

subject: Re:   ATTN; DEA
body:
Attn:Dear. 
RE: CHANGE OF YOUR BANK ACCOUNT DETAILS. We have received an official notification on 19/11/2024 from Mrs.chidy williams who claimed that you have authorized him to handle everything concerning the release of your inheritance Fund which is US $15.8Million,US Dollars, as he has confirmed to us that you are now in the Hospital taking care of your mother illness. Meanwhile,in the consideration to the our Official code of conduct and services here in Cotonou, Benin, we deem it necessary that we should get in touch with you first for confirmation before we can proceed with his request. Therefore, we need your prompt instruction to proceed with him in this matter for the purpose of remitting the fund to his nominative bank account details below:-Bank:name;National Bank. American Savings Bank CaliforniaAddress: 1143 Nashville PikeGallatin, Tennessee 38402Account Name:Mr.Mrs.chidy williamsAccount Number:394029944233Routing Numbers:Electronic Transfer:83725034Wire Transfer:009384213Bank Phone:(+1626-508-5439 The release of the fund will be fixed as soon as we receive your prompt response to this message. it is very important that you should get in touch with us for immediate confirmation to enable us transfer this money to him above mentioned bank account as you instructed. NOTE: Failure to reply will give us no other option than to believe you are the one that give him the power to receive the payment on your behalf and enable us to proceed to complete the transfer to his above nominative bank account contact us email now Yours faithfully,one more thing if you know you need this fund you have to comply with me by sending the needed fee or i will send your document to sign Change account
this is the only fee needed from you because this office will close very soon okay please if you know you can't pay $55 for the document don't answer okay A WAIT YOUR REPLY AND THE REQUIRED PAYMENT CONFIRMATION
DETAILS.THANKS AND REGARDS,Mr. Kenneth Henderson

subject: Re:   ATTN; DEA
body:
Hello Kenneth Henderson,

Thank you for your message. I understand that there's a fee involved for the document. Could you please provide more details about this document? What is it for and why is it necessary? Also, could you explain how the payment process works?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Berniece

subject: Re:   ATTN; DEA
body: Greetings to you and your family hope all is well this is to inform you that I acknowledge the report of your email and the content are willing noted the reason why we are obtaining this documents is to backup the delivery to avoid any stoppage at the airport so we don't want to have any issues due to the amount involved so I will advise you to try your best and they make the payment through iTunes card or through MoneyGram the enable us process the documents and forward them to you with the being called of the ATM card once you receive it

subject: Re:   ATTN; DEA
body:
Hello there! I hope you're doing well too. Thank you for your message, it's quite interesting. So, if I understand correctly, you're suggesting that I make a payment to ensure the delivery of an ATM card? Could you please explain more about this ATM card and why it would be sent to me?

Best wishes,
Berniece

subject: Re:   ATTN; DEA
body: They found was approved by United nation and will be delivered to DHL so if you can be able to make the payment as soon as possible we will receive your

subject: Re:   ATTN; DEA
body:
Hello there,

That sounds like an interesting development! I'm curious, how did the United Nations get involved in this? And why is DHL specifically chosen for delivery? I'd love to know more about this process. 

Just a quick note, I'm not in a position to make any payments at the moment. But I'm definitely interested in learning more about this. Can you share more details?

Best wishes,
Berniece

subject: Re:   ATTN; DEA
body:
Hello there! 

Wow, that sounds like a big deal! The United Nations, you say? That's impressive. Can you tell me more about what they found and why it needs to be delivered through DHL? I'm really interested in understanding the whole process. 

Also, about the payment, could you provide more details on how it works and what it's for? I'd appreciate your help in understanding this better.

Best wishes,
Berniece
